name: Netlify (npx)
description: Deploy sites, manage DNS, check build status, and configure Netlify projects. Supports site creation, environment variables, and serverless functions.

inputs.label: Netlify Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Personal access token for the Netlify API. Optional if using browser-based auth.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to app.netlify.com > User Settings > Applications
2. Scroll to Personal Access Tokens
3. Click 'New access token'
4. Name your token and click 'Generate token'
5. Copy the token

auth.instructions: Optionally provide a Personal Access Token from https://app.netlify.com/user/applications. Without one, browser-based auth may be used.
